name: Honk Your Heart Out
description:
Honk Your Heart Out is a rhythm game designed to be a simulation for a goose courtship dance. The sound is designed off of the chord theory of music made for love songs. This is a stylized game using a combination of Unreal's unlit materials and custom stylized shaders. All elements of the project were created in the span of 48 hours. In preparation for this game jam, we set up source control using Perforce and a shared drive for brainstorming and management. 

Controls: WASD, HJKL, Arrow Keys

Members: isabella bradberry, jack warham, joshua martin, krystal gonzalez

Credits: Unreal Engine, Maya, Blender, Substance Painter, Procreate, Musescore, Audacity, Premiere Pro and Photoshop.
